title: Ch4 Ugly House To Lovely House Series 1 1of5 Glamorgan 720p x264
description:
Ugly House to Lovely House: Series 1

Technology Documentary hosted by George Clarke, published by Channel 4 in 2016 - English narration 
http://docuwiki.net/images/b/b0/Ugly-House-to-Lovely-House-Series-1-Cover.jpg

Information
------------------------------

Ugly House To Lovely House: Series 1
George Clarke and leading architects show that even the ugliest house can be transformed into a home to be proud of, proving that great design doesn't have to cost the earth


1)  Glamorgan 
Beginning with the 1970s home of Tony and Sarah in the Vale of Glamorgan. The couple want rid of the pebbledash facade, small windows and dated decor, to create a great family home on a relatively modest budget of Â£60,000. They receive some bespoke and cutting-edge input from commercial and residential architect Greg Blee, with a plan that will link their home to the landscape beyond, including a Shard-like extension
